nodes.text: Soda was a carbonated beverage that contained sugar.[source?] It was one of the drinks served in Moshi Bar on Coruscant during the Clone Wars. The drink was also advertised on the ecumenopolis during the war.

Having accepted a bounty on Senator Jar Jar Binks, Melvin Fett went to the desert planet Tatooine in search of the Gungan. When the bounty hunter became dehydrated during his hunt, Fett found a Senator Jar Jar Binks commemorative drinking cup filled with soda, and so consumed the beverage, sating his thirst.
